Spend your special day in the North Yorkshire countryside!


Whether you want to tie the knot surrounded by lush green fields or a cosy wedding in an antique timber barn, our farm has alot to offer. We are located in the small village of Gateforth, only 5 miles from the town of Selby but wonderfully quiet and surrounded by nature.


Get in touch to find out more!
